teaser: First up, more on the massive hack of the United States Postal Service. Then, we talk the single biggest shopping day for singles in China. And last up, Garth Brooks, who is back from a long semi-retirement, is out with a new online store for his music and others, called GhostTunes. We look at who else is on the service, and the challenges a new entrant to this market faces.
description: First up, more on the massive hack of the United States Postal Service. Then, we talk the single biggest shopping day for singles in China. And last up, Garth Brooks, who is back from a long semi-retirement, is out with a new online store for his music and others, called GhostTunes. We look at who else is on the service, and the challenges a new entrant to this market faces.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, October 11, 2014
